VI.ii.1.B.1.b
.
Special Provisions for a Surviving Spouse in a Medicaid Nursing Home
If a surviving spouse is eligible for DIC and resides in a Medicaid-covered nursing home, he/she may wish to elect Survivors Pension to take advantage of the $90 Medicaid provisions of
38 U.S.C. 5503(f)
.
References
:  For more information on
$90 Medicaid provisions, see
38 CFR 3.551(i)
, and
pension reductions for Medicaid nursing home care, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 2.A.1
.
